name: Go Libraries
body:
### My Go Libs
These are some libs I use and like

### The Libraries
#### Scraping
- https://github.com/yhat/scrape  

  Some simple and helpful additions to `x/net/html`
- https://github.com/ericchiang/css  

  CSS Selectors for `x/net/html`

#### Misc
- https://github.com/apex/log  

  Apex Logging Framework
  I prefer this one over the other solution, because it supports different formatters per output
- https://github.com/olebedev/config  

  Configuration for your project from several sources (files, environment variables, program arguments, ...)

#### External Services
- https://github.com/bwmarrin/discordgo  
  Go bindings to Discord

### Queued for Review
- https://github.com/imdario/go-html-transform  

  Extensions for the old exp/html parser.  
  Needs Conversion to `x/net/html`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
